findings.title: Front running attacks
findings.description: We checked for the possibility of front-running the Oracle call, but this was not feasible.

findings.title: Softlock denial of service attacks
findings.description: Denial of service attack through softlock.

findings.title: Functions with excessive gas cost
findings.description: The project has opportunities to reduce gas consumption by optimizing functions and struct ordering.

findings.title: Needlessly complex code and contract interactions
findings.description: The code has unnecessary complexity in terms of contract interactions which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Poor or nonexistent error handling
findings.description: The smart contract lacks proper error handling mechanisms, which can lead to unexpected behavior and potential security risks.

findings.title: Failure to use a withdrawal pattern
findings.description: The contract does not utilize a safe withdrawal pattern, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Insufficient validation of the input parameters
Misuse of the different call methods
Integer overflow errors
findings.description: No integer overflow errors were found.

findings.title: Outdated version of Solidity compiler
findings.description: The project uses an outdated version of the Solidity compiler.
